CutSceneText.Text: Welcome! The national hero of Tijerid, [%username]!
I cannot imagine what would Tijerid be like now if it weren't for you...
I apologize that I didn't consider your advice carefully enough.
Anyway, I wonder how did those Krall think of feigning a frontal assault while sneaking into the underground waterway to poison the city's water supply...
This is too shrewd for a Krall to come up with.
It wasn't the Krall! It must've been Jurid who came up with it! How dare he even think of massacring ordinary citizens when he already attempted to revolt!
I managed to dispose of the Krall chieftain named [Shandu], but I didn't see Jurid.
We must mobilize our entire army and ferret him out from the hole he is hiding in!
We can't mobilize all our soldiers just to catch a traitor. They are already exhausted as it is after fighting the Krall...
... Lord Rheal!!
I have been with you and your brother for a long time, first as a teacher, and now as your advisor.
I tried my best to lead both of you on to the path of righteousness, but it is my fault that Jurid has turned out this way.
... As the responsibility lies with me, I will take it upon myself to find Jurid and put an end to all of it.
Calm down, Sir Belus.
Jurid is my only big brother. And it was he who should have become the Soldier of the Elysean Army...
... If he did became one, perhaps things might not have ended up like this.
...In any case, I wish that... You would leave this matter with me.
...I understand, my lord. If that's what Lord Rheal thinks...
Oh, I'm sorry. I had forgotten about you, [%username], the hero who saved Tijerid.
On behalf of Tijerid, I sincerely express my gratitude.
There is no need.
I will have the knight guarding the audience chamber, Tellia, to prepare your reward.
It may seem a little inadequate for all that you've done, but I hope you will continue to work hard for the good of Tijerid.
